projects.name: bachelor-thesis
projects.description: Co-engineered monitoring probe for Bluetooth Low Energy using ESP32. Created parallel monitoring system with three microcontrollers and developed neural network detection methods (MLP and 1D CNN) for real-time connection detection. Includes web application GUI for connection visualization.

projects.name: isa-imap-client
projects.description: IMAP client implementing RFC3501 protocol for downloading emails with SSL/TLS encryption, certificate verification, and selective message fetching.

projects.name: icp
projects.description: Interactive mobile robot simulator with autonomous and remote-controlled navigation. Drag-and-drop map creation, obstacle avoidance, and customizable robot parameters.

projects.name: second-foundation
projects.description: High-performance trading exchange system built in 24 hours. Secured 2nd place in Second Foundation hackathon with CTF-like format. Focused on throughput optimization and state persistence.

projects.name: CAncer-simulation
projects.description: Cellular automaton model simulating tumor growth dynamics. Implements the Valentim et al. model, visualizing cancer cell proliferation over time.

projects.name: iis
projects.description: Equipment borrowing management system for art school studios with complete access control, workflow automation, and MySQL backend.

projects.name: ITU
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer blackjack with live state synchronization, dynamic player management, and complete game logic implementation.

projects.name: IMP
projects.description: LED control system with web interface for ESP32. Multiple RGB animation modes, programmable sequences, and mobile-responsive interface with FreeRTOS.

projects.name: ipk-packet-sniffer
projects.description: Packet sniffer using PCAP library supporting TCP, UDP, ARP, ICMP, IGMP, MLD, and NDP protocols with flexible filtering and IPv4/IPv6 support.

projects.name: ipk-chat-client
projects.description: Chat client with dual TCP/UDP support and multi-threaded architecture with configurable timeouts and retransmission.

projects.name: bsec-2025
projects.description: Personal financial management web application with gamification features. Built for BSEC hackathon CODE IT! Challenge, focused on creating engaging user experience for financial tracking.
